com.att.android.arodatacollector.main

Class AROCollectorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.att.android.arodatacollector.main.AROCollectorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks

    public class AROCollectorService
extends android.app.Service
    Contains methods for managing the tcpdump and video capture processes while recording a trace during the application life-cycle.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEBUG
      A boolean value that indicates whether or not to enable logging for this class in a debug build of the ARO Data Collector.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> flurryTimedEvent
      Timed event used to log the duration of trace for use by Flurry
      static boolean isFlurryLogEventsEnabled
      A boolean value that indicates whether flurry events will be logged to flurry.
      java.util.Calendar startCalTime
      Start Time of trace used for Flurry Analytics
      static java.lang.String TAG
      A string for logging an ARO Data Collector service.
